verses.verse: And when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> there was silence <S%G4602><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the space of half <S%G2256><s%> an hour. <S%G2256><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> and to them were given <S%G1325><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> trumpets. <S%G4536><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the altar, <S%G2379><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> censer; <S%G3031><s%> and there was given <S%G1325><s%> to him much <S%G4183><s%> incense, <S%G2368><s%> that he should offer <S%G1325><s%> it with the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> on the golden <S%G5552><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was before <S%G1799><s%> the throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of the incense, <S%G2368><s%> which came with the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> ascended <S%G305><s%> up before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> out of the angel's <S%G32><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And the angel <S%G32><s%> took <S%G4327><s%> the censer, <S%G3031><s%> and filled <S%G1072><s%> it with fire <S%G4442><s%> of the altar, <S%G2379><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> the earth: <S%G1093><s%> and there were voices, <S%G5456><s%> and thunder, <S%G1027><s%> and lightning, <S%G796><s%> and an earthquake. <S%G4578><s%>

And the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> trumpets <S%G4536><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> to sound. <S%G4537><s%>

The first <S%G4413><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and there followed <S%G1096><s%> hail <S%G5464><s%> and fire <S%G4442><s%> mingled <S%G3396><s%> with blood, <S%G129><s%> and they were cast <S%G906><s%> on the earth: <S%G1093><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of trees <S%G1186><s%> was burnt <S%G2618><s%> up, and all <S%G3956><s%> green <S%G5515><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%> was burnt <S%G2618><s%> up.

And the second <S%G1208><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and as it were a great <S%G3173><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%> was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea: <S%G2281><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the sea <S%G2281><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> blood; <S%G129><s%>

And the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the creatures <S%G2938><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and had <S%G2192><s%> life, <S%G5590><s%> died; <S%G599><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the ships <S%G4143><s%> were destroyed. <S%G1311><s%>

And the third <S%G5154><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and there fell <S%G4098><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> star <S%G792><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> as it were a lamp, <S%G2985><s%> and it fell <S%G4098><s%> on the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the rivers, <S%G4215><s%> and on the fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters; <S%G5204><s%>

And the name <S%G3686><s%> of the star <S%G792><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Wormwood: <S%G894><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the waters <S%G5204><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519><s%> wormwood; <S%G894><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> men <S%G444><s%> died <S%G599><s%> of the waters, <S%G5204><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they were made <S%G4087><s%> bitter. <S%G4087><s%>

And the fourth <S%G5067><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the sun <S%G2246><s%> was smitten, <S%G4141><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the moon, <S%G4582><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the stars; <S%G792><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> as the third <S%G5154><s%> part of them was darkened, <S%G4654><s%> and the day <S%G2250><s%> shone <S%G5316><s%> not for a third <S%G5154><s%> part of it, and the night <S%G3571><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

And I beheld, <S%G1492><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> flying <S%G4072><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the middle <S%G3321><s%> of heaven, <S%G3321><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> woe, <S%G3759><s%> woe, <S%G3759><s%> to the inhabitants <S%G2730><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> by reason <S%G1537><s%> of the other <S%G3062><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> of the trumpet <S%G4536><s%> of the three <S%G5140><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are yet <S%G3195><s%> to sound! <S%G4537><s%>
